block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$825,000 42 West 13th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and bath, high ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, terrace, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,054, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $849,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$1.69 million 47 East 88th Street 2-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, beamed ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, 2 terraces; maintenance $2,092, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.695 million, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$1.8 million 127 West 80th Street 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,200-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a town house; dining area, high ceilings, h/w floors, common garden; maintenance $1,778, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.85 million, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Brown Harris Stevens)

$1.15 million 205 West 57th Street (Osborne) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,750-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, library, windowed eat-in kitchen, 3 fireplaces, 16-ft. ceilings, parquet floors, oversize windows; maintenance $1,990, 36% tax-deductible; listed at $1.395 million, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$425,000 306 West 13th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 890-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; exposed brick walls, fireplace, den; maintenance $792, 32% tax-deductible; listed at $475,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy; Douglas Elliman)

$216,500 3515 Henry Hudson Parkway (Briarcliff) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a 47-year-old building; part-time doormen, h/w floors, terrace; maintenance $848, 53% tax-deductible; listed at $235,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Susan E. Goldy)

$426,500 155 Lefferts Place 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths in other; eat-in kitchen in each; taxes $1,800; listed at $419,000 (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (Broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

$390,000 19 Prospect Park West 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a converted prewar mansion; dining area, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 2 skylights, private terrace, Prospect Park view; maintenance $637, 39% tax-deductible; listed at $375,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$376,000 2606 Avenue Y 2-family, semiattached prewar brick house; 3 bedrooms in primary unit; 2 bedrooms in other; 1 bath in each; finished basement, 1-car garage; taxes $2,000; listed at $395,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Kline Realty)

$302,000 68-21 Harrow Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 55-year-old attached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,742; listed at $325,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Century 21/Laffey Associates; Kingdom)

$315,000 63-139 Alderton Street 60-year-old 2-family attached brick house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; 21-by-103-ft. lot; taxes $2,500; listed at $330,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage Forest Hills)

$350,000 17 Emerson Court 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 30-year-old colonial; dining area, renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, Florida room, 1-car garage, 45-by-138-ft. lot; taxes $2,250; listed at $399,000, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

$239,000 193 Bryant Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 40-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,884; listed at $239,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Kingsley)

$462,000 21 Meadow Glen Road 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 15-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room with fireplace, basement, 2-car attached garage, 1.3-acre lot; taxes $9,200; listed at $479,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$450,000 73 Radnor Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 66-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, fireplace, screened porch, 1-car attached garage, 53-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,900; listed at $489,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Trylon)

$645,000 6 Wimbledon Drive 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 13-year-old condominium town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, pool, tennis; taxes $8,900; common charge $280; listed at $659,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: T.J. Realty; Goodstein Harbor Town)

$1,052,000 28 Garey Drive 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 8-year-old colonial; entry hall, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, dining room, library, music room, Florida room, wine cellar, 1-acre lot; taxes $14,986; listed at $829,000 (multiple bids), 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Coldwell Banker)

$400,000 42 Chestnut Ridge Way 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 37-year-old raised ranch; front courtyard, tiled entry hall, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, cathedral ceiling, deck, 2-car garage, cul-de-sac, 0.35-acre lot; taxes $9,711; listed at $427,000, 44 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

$360,000 47-49 East Birch Street 75-year-old 2-family house; 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, terrace in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath in other; 2-car garage; taxes $8,335; listed at $375,000, 29 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$685,000 11 Hathaway Lane 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 59-year-old colonial; center hall, bay window, fieldstone fireplace, wet bar, skylight, family room, paneled basement, 0.4-acre lot; taxes $11,529; listed at $699,500, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Century 21 Wolff)

$245,000 31 Ridgedale Road 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 43-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.72-acre lot; taxes $3,445; listed at $244,900 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$1.335 million 38 Hidden Brook Drive 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 46-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, family room, solarium, eat-in kitchen, au-pair quarters, 3 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 0.55-acre lot; taxes $7,914; listed at $1.45 million, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich; Sotheby's International)

$517,000 12 Broad Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 35-year-old colonial; renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, family room, screened-in porch, semifinished basement, 1-acre lot; taxes $5,352; listed at $495,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/ Wilton; Van Slycke Associates)

$279,900 47 Dale Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 30-year-old split level; living room with fireplace, eat-in kitchen, c/a, finished basement, patio, 100-by-157-ft. lot; taxes $5,204; listed at $279,900, 2 days on market (Broker: Weichert)

$520,000 2 Whitfield Court 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 8-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, den, c/a, deck, 2-car garage, 1.22-acre lot; taxes $10,043; listed at $529,900, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$879,900 8 Heather Court 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 25-year-old center-hall colonial; h/w floors, c/a, 2-car garage, 0.87-acre lot; taxes $9,576; listed at $879,900, 3 days on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Terrie O'Connor Realtors)

Correction: August 20, 2000, Sunday A picture with the Residential Sales report on Aug. 6, with an entry about a four-bedroom house at 21 Meadow Glen Road in Fort Salonga, N.Y., was published in error. It was a duplicate of one for the Gazetteer chart in the same issue and showed a four-bedroom house at 584 Center Briarwood Avenue in West Islip, N.Y.

A picture with the Residential Sales report on Aug. 6, with an entry about a four-bedroom house at 21 Meadow Glen Road in Fort Salonga, N.Y., was published in error. It was a duplicate of one for the Gazetteer chart in the same issue and showed a four-bedroom house at 584 Center Briarwood Avenue in West Islip, N.Y.
